headline: Dominion Energy (D): Surge in Net Income Challenges Valuation Concerns in Latest Earnings
summary: Dominion Energy (D) turned in an impressive earnings report, with net income climbing 49.7% year-over-year and net profit margin improving to 16.7% from last year's 11.8%. Earnings are forecast to grow at 7.85% annually, though that pace is behind the broader US market's 15.9% projection. While revenue and profit momentum are clear positives, investors may take note of valuation concerns and risks tied to dividend sustainability in light of a stock price that sits well above estimated fair...
